DOC.detailed_description: Up 50 patient fulfil criterion diagnosis multiple sclerosis ( MS ) randomize either 3 week pace activity self-management relaxation therapy . Both treatment group receive 3 weekly session spread 3 consecutive week . All treatment deliver occupational therapist physiotherapist . One treatment session last 45 minute .
